pages.text: While the shovel sees little use normally, the ability of the $(item)Soul Alloy Shovel$() is likely to become a good friend. When used it will seek out any items around and bring them back to it's caller. The $(item)Soul Alloy Shovel$() may be fitted with $(l:conjuring:basics/basic_gem_tinkering#aspect_gems)Aspect Gems$(), which improves it in certain aspects:$(br) $(li)$(#007a18)≈ Haste: Improves the pace of digging with the shovel. Stacks with Efficiency.$()$(br)

$(li)$(#a80f01)ღ Abundance: Enriches the loot found when digging up treasure. Stacks with Fortune.$()$(br) $(li)$(#4d8184)λ Scope: Expands the literal scope of digging. Increases by 1 block per gem.$()$(br) $(li)$(#123f89)ʊ Ignorance: Ignores a small amount of durability loss when using the tool. Stacks with Unbreaking.
